VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.label: fire
VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the capability to utilize and manage fire for various purposes. Unlocks firefighting job.

VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.label: agriculture
VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to grow various staple crops. Unlocks growing job.

VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.label: culture
VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the ability to conduct research, as well as develop ideological thoughts. Unlocks intellectual job.
